tag_list: free-preparation-material, important-terms-in-project-risk-management, online-pmp-study-material, online-pmp-training, online-training, online-training-and-tagged-free-preparation-material, online-training-and-tagged-online-pmp-preparation, pmp, pmp-certi
overview:
Simplilearn offers online as well as blended training programs [classroom + e-learning] for professional certification; currently offering PMP certification exam prep courses.

We are a Registered Education Provider (REP) to Project Management Institute USA.Simplilearn provides exclusive online access to PMI certified course content to facilitate convenient self paced study while earning requisite PDUs to qualify for the PMP Certification exam.

With tremendous sense of achievement, we have trained 6000+ professionals across industries on project management. We provide PMP training to professionals from across the globe.
